content:encoded:
We begin with The Crime Club on this week’s Case Closed. From May 8, 1947, it’s their episode titled, The Corpse Wore A Wig.

(30:18) Richard Diamond, Private Detective closes the show with his story, The Brown Envelope Case. That episode aired December 7, 1951.

Download CaseClosed707

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’re able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
